function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Droplet transmission of viruses through sneezing and coughing in confined spaces.","Impact":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases in indoor environments.","Mitigation":"Implementation of adequate ventilation systems and use of face masks in indoor spaces.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, and UV germicidal lamps for air disinfection.","People":"Individuals in indoor spaces, especially in crowded areas.","Owner":"Building managers, health and safety officials."},{"Description":"Airborne transport of droplets leading to long-distance transmission of viruses.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission over longer distances.","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation and air circulation in indoor environments, use of HEPA filters and UV germicidal lamps.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and UV germicidal lamps.","People":"Individuals in indoor and outdoor spaces near infected areas.","Owner":"Public health authorities, building managers, urban planners."},{"Description":"Waterborne transmission of infections through contaminated water sources.","Impact":"Potential widespread contamination of water supplies leading to large-scale disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implementation of water treatment and purification systems, regular testing of water quality.","Technologies":"Water filtration systems, chlorination, and UV disinfection.","People":"Communities relying on public water supplies and individuals using natural water sources.","Owner":"Water treatment facilities, environmental health organizations."}]}
